channel.title: US Congress declared Pizza as a vegetable

item.title: US Congress declared Pizza as a vegetable
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Brolapse, post:10, topic:422100”]

any other britfag miss these from school dinners? I don’t even care if they are like 1% turkey[/quote]

fuck me i remember those, those were BAD. Along with burgers and chips. WOW, nostalgia!

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:18, topic:422100”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=524778.msg3820456#msg3820456 date=1321733315]
tbh, when our school phased out burgers and chips + pizza for healthy food i just got hungrier and madder
[/quote]

Sure, when you are used to food that tastes good, you’ll be pissed off when they stop serving it. But healthy food doesn’t have to taste bad. And healthy food can still your hunger too.[/quote]
Yeah but I bet you haven’t seen or tasted the ‘healthy’ shit they gave us instead.

Read full topic

item.source: US Congress declared Pizza as a vegetable

item.title: US Congress declared Pizza as a vegetable
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

So if I put tomato sauce over my fries, they turn into vegetables too?

Taharok:

Pizza can be really healthy, if it isn’t packed with grease. It contains servings of fruit, grain, and dairy in one meal. I enjoy pizza and I think it’s a good thing this bill exists to continue having pizza on school lunch menus, but I posted it to show the stupidity of US Congress. They play politics in the most oxymoronic way possible.

There aren’t many deep frozen pizza’s available that aren’t ridden with fat and salt though. To be honest, I find it appalling that pizza and fries are part of school lunch menus. If you want to create a place for children to perform as good as they can, you serve stomach-filling breakfast for those who don’t eat breakfast at home and provide healthy lunches. Health should be part of education, not something that is being wrecked by education.

Besides, it’s not that hard to switch from unhealthy food to healthy food. Just stay away from very salty and fatty food for a few weeks and you won’t feel the need for it anymore.

Read full topic
item.source: US Congress declared Pizza as a vegetable

item.title: US Congress declared Pizza as a vegetable
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Eh yeah, their underlying regulation is anything that has 2 tablespoons or more of tomato sauce is now considered a vegetable, despite tomatoes being fruit.

Pizza can be really healthy, if it isn’t packed with grease. It contains servings of fruit, grain, and dairy in one meal. I enjoy pizza and I think it’s a good thing this bill exists to continue having pizza on school lunch menus, but I posted it to show the stupidity of US Congress. They play politics in the most oxymoronic way possible.

Read full topic

[quote=“Frell, post:11, topic:422100”]you eat dinner at school?[/quote]He means lunch obviously (which basically is dinner). In Sweden we eat breakfast, dinner and supper typically, where supper is pretty much like breakfast.
